title: ID -- sort of art-deco...
content:
Any help with this? The E R and G probably give the best clues. Any suggestions are much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110206171023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_3787.jpg)
author: gabederoche

comments.content:
That looks like it should be Neutraface.  
Probably Neutraface Text Book Italic Alternate:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20110206171023/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface")  
(The non-Alternate won't match the "G".)
